com.ece.superkids.achievements.entities

Class Achievements

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ece.superkids.achievements.entities.Achievements
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Achievements
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The Achievements object is an encapsulation of multiple achievements.
    Author:
    Ben Duong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Achievements()
      Create a new list of 10 blank achievements with scores from 10-100 in steps of 10.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Achievements

        public Achievements()
        Create a new list of 10 blank achievements with scores from 10-100 in steps of 10.

    • Method Detail

      • getAchievement

        public Achievement getAchievement(int number)
        Get an achievement in the list.
        Parameters:
        number - the index of the achievement
        Returns:
        The achievement at that index.

      • getAchievementsUnlocked

        public List<Achievement> getAchievementsUnlocked(int totalScore)
        Get the achievements that have been unlocked in this game. Achievements that are unlocked are removed from the list.
        Parameters:
        totalScore - the new total score the child has gotten.
        Returns:
        A list of achievements that the child has unlocked.

      • changeAchievement

        public void changeAchievement(int index,
                     Achievement newAchievement)
        Change an achievement. Achievements are then sorted by score.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the achievement to change
        newAchievement - the new achievement to use
